EmailTemplate.name: AERO_GDPR_Data_Management_mih.AERO_2019_Confirmation_DoubleOptIn_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Please confirm your subscription.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Subscription Confirmation Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You have successfully subscribed to {{lead.Signup:default=Honeywell Aerospace}} e-communications.* Please click the button below to confirm your subscription.
YES, SUBSCRIBE ME. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Email_Confirmation.html]]>
If you received this email by mistake, simply delete it. You won’t be subscribed if you do not click the confirmation link above.
You can change your preferences <[[http://na-sjp.marketo.com/lp/549-RAQ-832/Preference-Management.html]]> at any time. Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace*Marketing communications refers to communications about offerings, news and events, surveys, special offers, and related topics via telephone, email, and other forms of electronic communication (e.g., communications through social media platforms). If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/u/hq0pk0I00Q0000GnZ020XI0]]>
